instructions.reason_for_call: You want to exchange your Fleece Jacket to red color and half zipper. You also want to want to change your default address to your Washington DC address (which you do not want to reveal but is in one of the orders).
instructions.known_info: You name is Yusuf Hernandez and your email is yusuf.hernandez8836@example.com.

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hello, um, I would like to exchange my Fleece Jacket. I want it in red color and with a half zipper, please. Also, I want to change my default address to my Washington DC address, but I don't want to share the address details here. Could you help me with that?

message.content: Hello, um, I would like to exchange my Fleece Jacket. I want it in red color and with a half zipper, please. Also, I want to change my default address to my Washington DC address, but I don't want to share the address details here. Could you help me with that?

messages.content:
To assist you with the exchange of your Fleece Jacket to the red color with a half zipper, I will need the order ID and the item ID of the jacket you want to exchange. Also, I will need the item ID of the red half-zipper jacket you want as the replacement.

Regarding the change of your default address, I will need the new address details to proceed with the update. If you prefer not to share the address details here, you may consider updating it directly on your account on our website or app for security reasons.

Please provide the order ID and item IDs for the exchange, and let me know how you'd like to proceed with the address change.

message.content:
To assist you with the exchange of your Fleece Jacket to the red color with a half zipper, I will need the order ID and the item ID of the jacket you want to exchange. Also, I will need the item ID of the red half-zipper jacket you want as the replacement.

Regarding the change of your default address, I will need the new address details to proceed with the update. If you prefer not to share the address details here, you may consider updating it directly on your account on our website or app for security reasons.

Please provide the order ID and item IDs for the exchange, and let me know how you'd like to proceed with the address change.

My name is Yusuf Hernandez, and my email is yusuf.hernandez8836@example.com.
